words.def: a grounder that rolls along the infield
rotary motion of an object around its own axis
the actions and activities assigned to or required or expected of a person or group
A bordure which runs around the outline of a shield without touching the edge.
knowledge gained through tradition or anecdote
a mineral that contains metal that is valuable enough to be mined
to make a mistake or be incorrect
an extension at the end and at right angles to the main building
a trivalent metallic element of the rare earth group
a rare heavy polyvalent metallic element that resembles manganese chemically and is used in some alloys
a state in northwestern United States on the Pacific
angular distance above the horizon (especially of a celestial object)
